name: Parasitic Slayers (Macrune12)
description:
A simple dungeon crawler game I made for a high school project.  It uses randomly generated dungeons as a map. Simple enemy Ai with two kinds of enemy. Those enemies are melee users and range users.  The player only has a bow as a weapon and currently has no other weapon.  There are three stages of the map with distinctive styles for each dungeon. 

Controls:

  • WASD as movement
  • Mouse to aim
  • Left click to shoot
